text: Howard Duane Allman (November 20, 1946 â€“ October 29, 1971) was an American musician. He was the lead guitarist of the southern rock group, the Allman Brothers Band. He is often thought of as one of the greatest guitarists of all time, and is widely considered the greatest slide guitarist of all time. ==References== Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Writers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Southern rock musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:American soul musicians Category:American blues musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:1946 births Category:1971 deaths
title: Duane Allman
